text:
Elliot Page (born Ellen Philpotts-Page, February 21, 1987) is a Canadian actor. He was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actress for his role in "Juno", in which he played a pregnant teenager. He has also, before coming out as transgender, starred in movies including "Hard Candy", "Whip It", and "Inception".
Page is from Halifax, Nova Scotia.
Personal life.
On February 14, 2014, Page came out as gay, and has been a well-known advocate of the LGBTQ community. He married dancer Emma Portner in January 2018. In December 2020, he came out as transgender and non-binary.
